statements: SELECT * FROM goods_tracking
SELECT shipment_id, product_id, inbound_time FROM goods_tracking ORDER BY inbound_time DESC
SELECT product_id, outbound_time FROM goods_tracking WHERE RFID_tag = 'ABC123'
SELECT shipment_id, inbound_time, outbound_time FROM goods_tracking WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM goods_tracking WHERE shipment_id = '98765432-1234-5678-5678-192837465930'
SELECT * FROM goods_tracking WHERE outbound_time < '2021-10-01';
SELECT product_id, inbound_time FROM goods_tracking WHERE RFID_tag = 'XYZ' ORDER BY inbound_time DESC;
SELECT shipment_id FROM goods_tracking WHERE inbound_time > '2021-09-01' AND outbound_time IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(DATE_PART('day', outbound_time - inbound_time)) AS avg_transit_time FROM goods_tracking;
SELECT COUNT(*), DATE_TRUNC('month', inbound_time) AS month FROM goods_tracking GROUP BY month ORDER BY month ASC;
SELECT * FROM IncomingGoods;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM IncomingGoods WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM IncomingGoods WHERE product_name LIKE 'apple%';
SELECT * FROM OutgoingGoods ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, rfid_tag FROM OutgoingGoods WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM IncomingGoods WHERE product_name = 'Apple' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM OutgoingGoods WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, rfid_tag FROM IncomingGoods WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM OutgoingGoods WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM IncomingGoods WHERE rfid_tag LIKE '%AB%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Goods;
SELECT goods_name, goods_category FROM Goods WHERE goods_category='Electronics';
SELECT goods_name, goods_category, RFID_tag FROM Goods ORDER BY goods_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM IncomingGoods WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY received_date DESC;
SELECT goods_name, received_date, destination FROM Goods JOIN OutgoingGoods ON Goods.goods_id = OutgoingGoods.goods_id WHERE destination='Warehouse';
SELECT goods_name, goods_category FROM Goods WHERE RFID_tag = '1234'
SELECT * FROM Goods ORDER BY goods_name DESC
SELECT goods_name, goods_category, received_date FROM Goods JOIN IncomingGoods ON Goods.goods_id = IncomingGoods.goods_id
SELECT goods_name, goods_category, dispatched_date, destination FROM Goods JOIN OutgoingGoods ON Goods.goods_id = OutgoingGoods.goods_id WHERE destination = 'Warehouse'
SELECT incoming_id, quantity, received_date FROM IncomingGoods WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT * FROM incoming_goods;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM outgoing_goods;
SELECT id, item_code FROM incoming_goods ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM cross_docking WHERE dock_number = 1;
SELECT id, name, role FROM employee WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM incoming_goods WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_code, quantity FROM outgoing_goods WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY item_code;
SELECT ig.item_name, ig.quantity, c.dock_number FROM incoming_goods ig JOIN cross_docking c ON ig.id = c.incoming_goods_id WHERE c.time_stamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30';
SELECT e.name, e.role, o.quantity FROM employee e LEFT JOIN outgoing_goods o ON e.id = o.id WHERE o.rfid_tag IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT ig.item_name, og.item_name FROM incoming_goods ig, outgoing_goods og WHERE ig.item_code = og.item_code;
SELECT * FROM goods;
SELECT id, product_name FROM goods WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, rfid_tag FROM goods ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM incoming_goods WHERE arrival_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, goods_id, action_type FROM cross_docking_logs WHERE action_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-01 23:59:59';

SELECT * FROM goods
JOIN incoming_goods ON goods.id = incoming_goods.goods_id
JOIN outgoing_goods ON goods.id = outgoing_goods.goods_id

SELECT goods.product_name, incoming_goods.arrival_time FROM goods
JOIN incoming_goods ON goods.id = incoming_goods.goods_id

SELECT goods.product_name, outgoing_goods.departure_time FROM goods
JOIN outgoing_goods ON goods.id = outgoing_goods.goods_id

SELECT cdc.location, cdl.action_type FROM cross_docking_center AS cdc
JOIN cross_docking_logs AS cdl ON cdc.id = cdl.goods_id

SELECT cdc.capacity, cdl.action_type, cdl.action_time FROM cross_docking_center AS cdc
JOIN cross_docking_logs AS cdl ON cdc.id = cdl.goods_id
